tool_description: Tracks real-time status of inventory transfers across multiple carriers, providing delivery updates and exception alerts.

carrier_names.description: Corresponding carrier names for each tracking number

error_messages: Array length mismatch: tracking_numbers and carrier_names must have the same length.
Invalid tracking number: One or more tracking numbers are not recognized by the carrier.
Unsupported carrier: Some carriers are not supported by the tracking system.
Tracking service unavailable: Carrier tracking service is temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide arrays of tracking_numbers and corresponding carrier_names. Arrays must be the same length with matching positions. Use for monitoring transfer progress and identifying delivery issues.

tracking_status.description: Current status for each tracked shipment

location_updates.description: Latest location updates for each shipment
